synthesis_conditions.equipment: 250 mL Schlenk flask with reflux condenser
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Soaked four times in MeOH at 60 °C, each for 12 h
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Heated in vacuo on a Schlenk line at 80 °C for 1 day

additional_steps.details: Fully activated by heating in vacuo (< 4 µbar) on a Micromeritics 2420 gas sorption analyzer at 180 °C for 1 day

references: Caskey, S. R.; Wong-Foy, A. G.; Matzger, A. J. J. Am. Chem. Soc. 2008, 130, 10870–10871.

Bloch, E. D.; Murray, L. J.; Queen, W. L.; Chavan, S.; Maximoff, S. N.; Bigi, J. P.; Krishna, R.; Peterson, V. K.; Grandjean, F.; Long, G. J.; Smit, B.; Bordiga, S.; Brown, C. M.; Long, J. R. J. Am. Chem. Soc. 2011, 133, 14814–14822.
Geier, S. J.; Mason, J. A.; Bloch, E. D.; Queen, W. L.; Hudson, M. R.; Brown, C. M.; Long, J. R. Chem. Sci. 2013, 4, 2054–2061.

Kapelewski, M. T.; Geier, S. J.; Hudson, M. R.; Stück, D.; Mason, J. A.; Nelson, J. N.; Xiao, D. J.; Hulvey, Z.; Gilmour, E.; FitzGerald, S. A.; Head-Gordon, M.; Brown, C. M.; Long, J. R. J. Am. Chem. Soc. 2014, 136, 12119–12129.
Kapelewski, M. T.; Runčevski, T.; Tarver, J. D.; Jiang, H. Z. H.; Hurst, K. E.; Parilla, P. A.; Ayala, A.; Gennett, T.; FitzGerald, S. A.; Brown, C. M.; Long, J. R. Chem. Mater. 2018, 30, 8179–8189.

powder_x-ray_diffraction_measurements.details: High-resolution synchrotron X-ray powder diffraction data collected at beamline 17-BM at the Advanced Photon Source at Argonne National Laboratory.
powder_x-ray_diffraction_measurements.temperature: 250 K for 1-butene and 125 K for cis-2-butene
powder_x-ray_diffraction_measurements.wavelength: 0.45415 Å for 1-butene and 0.45411 Å for cis-2-butene
powder_x-ray_diffraction_measurements.refinement: Rietveld refinement performed with TOPAS-Academic v4.1.
